subject: [sugar] Can't load Web activity
body:
I am able to load sugar and launch some activities (Write, Etoys, Journal, Connect)However, while trying to load the Web activity I get the following:Web.log----------STDOUT - Registering '@
mozilla.org/module-loader/python;1' (libpyloader.so)STDOUT -STDERR - DEBUG:xpcom:Python Factory creating ModuleLoaderDEBUG - xpcom: Python Factory creating ModuleLoader
STDERR - DEBUG:xpcom:'int8 loadModule(in nsISomething, out retval nsISomething);' raised COM Exception -2147024809 (NS_ERROR_INVALID_ARG)Traceback (most recent call last):  File "/home/manuel/videos/2007-05-28-SUGAR/build/lib/python2.4/site-packages/xpcom/server/policy.py", line 277, in _CallMethod_
    return 0, func(*params)  File "/home/manuel/videos/2007-05-28-SUGAR/build/lib/python2.4/site-packages/xpcom/server/loader.py", line 92, in loadModule    return self._getCOMModuleForLocation(aFile)
  File "/home/manuel/videos/2007-05-28-SUGAR/build/lib/python2.4/site-packages/xpcom/server/loader.py", line 97, in _getCOMModuleForLocation    raise xpcom.ServerException(nsError.NS_ERROR_INVALID_ARG)
ServerException: -2147024809 (NS_ERROR_INVALID_ARG)DEBUG - xpcom: 'int8 loadModule(in nsISomething, out retval nsISomething);' raised COM Exception -2147024809 (NS_ERROR_INVALID_ARG)STDERR repeats about 8 more times
....Host OS : Mandriva 2007.0
